This site contains the analyses for the twitter audiences of N papers and preprints in genetics and genomics.

carjed.github.io/audiences

links to: 

carjed.github.io/audiences/reports/authors-title_ID.html

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
tg <- function (link, text){
  paste0("<a href='", link, "'>", text, "</a>")
}

reports <- list.files("audiences/reports")

for(report in reports){
  authors <- gsub("_", " ", gsub("et_al-.*", "", report))
  title <- gsub(" [0-9]{6,10}.html", "", gsub("_", " ", gsub(".*et_al-", "", report)))
  
  cat(tg(paste0("carjed.github.io/audiences/reports/", report), paste0(authors, "et al. '", title, "'")))
  cat("<br>")
  cat(tg(article_full_url, "View paper on Altmetric"))
  cat("<br>")
}


```
